alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 3:30AM MST until March 03 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A wintry mix of freezing rain and snow will continue through early this morning. Locally dense fog can also be expected. Expect ice accumulations of a light glaze, and snow accumulations less than an inch. * WHERE...Carter, Custer and Fallon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads are likely slick and hazardous in spots, including I-94 in the Miles City area. Where the ground is frozen, rain will freeze on contact even at temperatures above freezing. Areas of locally dense fog will reduce visibility to under half a mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
